colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B (^'DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI, ,'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI SLOB DPON RIN CHEN CHO RIGS NI STOBS KYIS 'KHOR LOS BGYUR BA CHING GIS RIGS LAS 'BYUNG BA JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA, ,BRTAN SRID KYI RIGS PA DANG LDAN PA GUNG RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG, GSO RTZIS RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHE THU DAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA @014A *, ,GNYIS KA'ANG, NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB A THA SHAL PA NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU 'KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SA SKYA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA, 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,^DGE SLONG 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
